Bluetooth devices must be visible or paired to be found. The search can take several seconds. To play the game the Bluetooth device must be compatible to the game and turned on.

Only paired Bluetooth devices are found. To search Bluetooth devices you have to allow access to the coarse location. To play the game the Bluetooth device must be compatible to the game and turned on.
No Bluetooth LED display is set.\nA valid address would be for example: 12:34:56:78:9A:BC.
The entered address is not valid. A valid address would be for example: 12:34:56:78:9A:BC.

The game is displayed on a Bluetooth LED display, therefore you have to search and set or set manually a Bluetooth LED display before you can play. On some devices, it is necessary to pair the device before you start the game. Further information are available at http://www.teco.edu/cm/dev/.

You control a point (the brightest) and must find the exit of each level. The exit is a certain point or a certain group of points. Pay attention in the levels are also moving enemy points. Furthermore, there are teleport points, which bring you to a certain place in the level. The border points are the darkest points.

You can design your own levels or download levels. Please insert in a directory “MasterTheMaze” in your home directory files with the name “Level”, the number of the level and the extension ".json". Start with “Level1.json”, then “Level2.json” and so on.
Please tilt your device in the\ndesired direction to control your point.
Are you sure that you want to exit? The score will be lost.
You have to allow read access to the storage if you want to play levels from the storage. If you want to play only the included levels, you need not allow read access to the storage.
It can be necessary to end the app and restart it to get read access to the storage.
To search for a Bluetooth LED display, you have to allow access to the coarse location. Otherwise, only paired devices can be shown.
You have to turn Bluetooth on to play the game.
